Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Goggles
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Gloves
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Rings, bands etc.

Rings can be worn on your finger. You are able to wear one ring on each hand (so 2 total). They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Acrobat's Ring
  • Striding +10%Striding +10%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 10% bonus to run speed.
  • Jump +7Jump +7: Passive: +7 Competence bonus to the Jump skill.
  • Tumble +7Tumble +7: Passive: +7 Competence bonus to the Tumble skill.
 3 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Lost Seekers
Adversion
  • Abjuration Focus +3 Abjuration Focus +3: +3 Equipment bonus to the DC of Abjuration spells.
  • Insightful Abjuration Focus +2Insightful Abjuration Focus +2: +2 Insight bonus to the DC of Abjuration spells.
  • Wizardry +112 Wizardry +112: +112 Enhancement bonus to spell points.
  • Spell Penetration III Spell Penetration III: Passive: +3 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
  • Empty Yellow Augment Slot Yellow Augments
    • Deathblock
    • Draconic Soul Gem
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +40
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +5% to +30%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +10 to +250
    Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +1 or +2
    • Diamond of Vitality +20
    • Globe of Imperial Blood
    • Globe of True Imperial Blood
    • Master's Gift
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +3 to +15
  • Adherent of the Mists Set (Heroic)Adherent of the Mists Set (Heroic): 5 Pieces Equipped:
    +5 Profane bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
    +10 Profane bonus to Positive, Negative, and Repair Amplification
    +5 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +10 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
 10 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Mad Tea Party End chest
Amara's Band
  • Wisdom +6 Wisdom +6: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • Exceptional Charisma +1Exceptional Charisma +1: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Charisma.
  • Exorcist of the Silver FlameExorcist of the Silver Flame: 3 additional Turn Undead attempts.
  • Incredible PotentialIncredible Potential: Incredible Potential: This ring's power has not been fully unleashed. When this ring is combined with 9 Shavarath War Trophies and ac Imbued Shard of Great Power in an Altar of Subjugation, its full potential will be reveled.

  • Strength +6 Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Exceptional Charisma +1Exceptional Charisma +1: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Charisma.

Arraetrikos' Bane (level 15)
  • Fire Resistance +29Fire Resistance +29: Passive: +29 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Insightful Enchantment Save +2Insightful Enchantment Save +2: +2 Insight bonus to your saves versus enchantments
  • Proof Against Poison +2Proof Against Poison +2: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +2 Insight bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 3 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Disease +1Proof Against Disease +1: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +1 Quality bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 2 + their Fortitude save).
  • Empty Yellow Augment Slot Yellow Augments
    • Deathblock
    • Draconic Soul Gem
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +40
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +5% to +30%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +10 to +250
    Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1

    • Globe of Imperial Blood

    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +3 to +15

Arraetrikos' Bane (level 29)
  • Fire Resistance +53Fire Resistance +53: Passive: +53 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Insightful Enchantment Save +5Insightful Enchantment Save +5: +5 Insight bonus to your saves versus enchantments
  • Proof Against Poison +5Proof Against Poison +5: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +5 Insight bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 6 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Disease +2Proof Against Disease +2: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +2 Quality bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 3 + their Fortitude save).

Celestial Amethyst Ring
  • Nearly FinishedNearly Finished: This item isn't quite finished, but it's only a step away from completion. Bring it to a Cannith Reforging Station and combine it with melted materials to restore this item to its full potential.
    • One of the following:
      • Strength +8 Strength +8: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +8 bonus to Strength.
      • Intelligence +8 Intelligence +8: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +8 bonus to Intelligence.
      • Charisma +8 Charisma +8: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +8 bonus to Charisma.
  • Improved Auto-RepairImproved Auto-Repair: This item has a small percentage chance to cast a Repair Serious Damage spell on you when you take damage.
  • Insightful Repair Amplification +15Repair Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming repair healing by +15 (Insight bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Repair +16Repair +16: Passive: +16 Competence bonus to the Repair skill.
  • Empty Green Augment Slot Blue Augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus or Protection (Deflection bonus): +1 to +8
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Golem's Heart
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +5 to +40
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +2 to +16
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +8
    Yellow Augments
    • Deathblock
    • Draconic Soul Gem
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +40
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +5% to +30%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)

Celestial Emerald Ring
  • Nearly FinishedNearly Finished: This item isn't quite finished, but it's only a step away from completion. Bring it to a Cannith Reforging Station and combine it with melted materials to restore this item to its full potential.
    • One of the following:
      • Constitution +8 Constitution +8: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
      • Strength +8 Strength +8: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Strength.
      • Wisdom +8 Wisdom +8: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • Insightful Incite +30Insightful Incite +30: +30 Insight bonus to increased threat generation from melee damage
  • Insightful Intimidate +8Insightful Intimidate +8: Passive: +8 Insight bonus to the Intimidate skill.
  • Linguistics 10%Linguistics: This item reduced the cooldowns of your Social skills (Diplomacy, Bluff, Intimidate) by 10%. This does not stack with the Negotiator ability.
  • Empty Blue Augment Slot Blue Augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus or Protection (Deflection bonus): +1 to +8
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Golem's Heart
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +5 to +40
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +2 to +16
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +8
    Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +1 or +2
    • Diamond of Vitality +20
    • Globe of Imperial Blood
    • Globe of True Imperial Blood
    • Master's Gift

      • Strength +8 Strength +8: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +8 bonus to Strength.
      • Dexterity +8 Dexterity +8: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +8 bonus to Dexterity.
      • Intelligence +8 Intelligence +8: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +8 bonus to Intelligence.
  • Stunning +9 Stunning +9: +9 Enhancement bonus to the DC of character's Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Accuracy +12 Accuracy +12: Passive: +12 Competence bonus to attack rolls
  • GhostlyGhostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Copper Band
  • Proof Against Poison +6Proof Against Poison +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).

 20 Bound to Character on Acquire, ExclusiveBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire
This is an Exclusive item. You may only carry one at a time.
Epic Ring of Unknown Origins
  • Proof Against Disease +8Proof Against Disease +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Poison +8Proof Against Poison +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).
  • Immunity to FearImmunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
  • Blindness ImmunityBlindness Immunity: Grants its wearer immunity to blindness effects.
  • Whirlwind WardWhirlwind Ward: This effect renders you immune to being knocked down by an Air Elemental's whirlwind. However, it does not prevent you from being knocked back or away from touching the Air Elemental.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment. Bring this item to the Fountain of Necrotic Might outside the Black Mausoleum and combine it with Item:Epic Tapestry Shreds to upgrade the item. (Empty Yellow Augment Slot Yellow Augments

Glorious Dawn (Level 14)
  • Deathblock IVDeathblock IV: Passive: 12% Enhancement Bonus to Negative Energy Absorption. In addition, you are immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.
  • Empty Green Augment Slot Blue Augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus or Protection (Deflection bonus): +1 to +8
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Golem's Heart
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +5 to +40
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +2 to +16
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +8
    Yellow Augments
    • Deathblock
    • Draconic Soul Gem
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +40
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +5% to +30%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +10 to +250
    Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +1 or +2
    • Diamond of Vitality +20
    • Globe of Imperial Blood
    • Globe of True Imperial Blood
    • Master's Gift
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +3 to +15
  • Solar Guard IIISolar Guard III: When Hit in Melee: Deals 3 to 12 Light damage to your attacker.

  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.

Omniscience
  • Heightened Awareness (4)Heightened Awareness (4): This item helps you to quickly read situations with sharpness and clarity, allowing you to predict actions before they occur. You gain a +4 Insight bonus to AC.
  • Exceptional Resistance +2 (Reflex)Exceptional Resistance +2 (Reflex): Passive: +2 bonus to Reflex saves that stacks with all other bonuses except Exceptional Resistance +2 (Reflex)
  • Exceptional Fortification (+25%)Exceptional Fortification (+25%): This item produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +25% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and the damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered an Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification

  • Move Silently +13Move Silently +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill.
  • BlurryBlurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Attacks from enemies have a 20% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Empty Colorless Augment Slot Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +1 or +2
    • Diamond of Vitality +20
    • Globe of Imperial Blood
    • Globe of True Imperial Blood
    • Master's Gift
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +3 to +15
 14 Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip The Prison of the Planes Mabar room's chest (Heroic Elite)
Ring of Shadows (Level 23)
  • Hide +17Hide +17: Passive: +17 Competence bonus to the Hide skill.
  • Move Silently +17Move Silently +17: Passive: +17 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill.
  • BlurryBlurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Attacks from enemies have a 20% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • GhostlyGhostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Empty Colorless Augment Slot Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +1 or +2
    • Diamond of Vitality +20
    • Globe of Imperial Blood
    • Globe of True Imperial Blood
    • Master's Gift
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +3 to +15

Ring of Shadows (Level 24)
  • Hide +20Hide +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Hide skill.
  • Move Silently +20Move Silently +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill.
  • BlurryBlurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Attacks from enemies have a 20% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • GhostlyGhostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Ring of Shadows (Level 25)
  • Hide +20Hide +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Hide skill.
  • Move Silently +20Move Silently +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill.
  • Lesser DisplacementLesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a 25% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • GhostlyGhostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Ring of Unknown Origins
  • Empty Yellow Augment Slot Yellow Augments
    • Deathblock
    • Draconic Soul Gem
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +40
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +5% to +30%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +10 to +250
    Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +1 or +2
    • Diamond of Vitality +20
    • Globe of Imperial Blood
    • Globe of True Imperial Blood
    • Master's Gift
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +3 to +15
  • Proof Against Disease +6Proof Against Disease +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Poison +6Proof Against Poison +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • Intelligence +5 Intelligence +5: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
  • Charisma +5 Charisma +5: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

  • Swim +11Swim +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Swim skill.
  • Dexterity +4 Dexterity +4: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Underwater ActionUnderwater Action: This item grants the wearer the ability to breathe water as if it were air.
  • Good Luck +1Good Luck +1: This item gives a +1 Luck bonus to all saves and skill checks.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 2
      • Adds Protection +3Protection +3: Passive: +3 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 3
      • Dexterity +4 Dexterity +4: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity. becomes Dexterity +5 Dexterity +5: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

    • Shatter +10Shatter +10: This effect gives a +10 enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Sunder and Improved sunder attempts.
    • Stunning +10 Stunning +10: +10 Enhancement bonus to the DC of character's Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.
